Uses of Package
authentication

  • Packages that use authentication 
    Package Description
    authentication  
    catchgame  
    userinterface  
  • Classes in authentication used by authentication 
    Class and Description
    LoginError
    These enums all describe conditions that will cause a login to fail
    NewUserException
    This class is base class for different types of exceptions that can be thrown when making a new account.
    PasswordError
    These are the possible errors that can be describe an incorrectly formatted password.
    UsernameError
    These are used to represent the possible errors that can occur when creating a user name.
  • Classes in authentication used by catchgame 
    Class and Description
    BadLoginException
    This Exception class is thrown when a user cannot login.
    NewUserException
    This class is base class for different types of exceptions that can be thrown when making a new account.
    User
    This class is meant to be used as a base class for users who are logging in using the tools in the authentication class.
  • Classes in authentication used by userinterface 
    Class and Description
    PasswordError
    These are the possible errors that can be describe an incorrectly formatted password.
    UsernameError
    These are used to represent the possible errors that can occur when creating a user name.
